Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package nmap for versions less than 7.93-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package nmap for versions less than 7.93-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nmap is earlier than 7.93-1, affected by CVE-2018-25032
